name: Deploy Uptime Kuma

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: Set up SSH
      uses: webfactory/ssh-agent@v0.5.4
      with:
        ssh-private-key: ${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}

    - name: Copy files to EC2
      run: |
        rsync -avz --delete ./docker ubuntu@${{ secrets.EC2_IP }}:~/InfraAutomate-UptimeKuma/

    - name: SSH and deploy
      run: |
        ssh ubuntu@${{ secrets.EC2_IP }} << 'EOF'
          cd ~/InfraAutomate-UptimeKuma/docker
          docker-compose down
          docker-compose pull
          docker-compose up -d
        EOF
